com.almasb.fxgl.event

Annotation Type Handles


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Handles
    Used to mark a method that handles an event of specific type.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (almaslvl@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Usage Sample

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String eventType
      If you have an event type MyGameEvent.ANY, then event type is "ANY".

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<?> eventClass
      If it's an EntityEvent, then the class is EntityEvent.class, so if you define your own event class, it'll be MyEvent.class.

    • Element Detail

      • eventType

        public abstract String eventType
        If you have an event type MyGameEvent.ANY, then event type is "ANY". EventType object has to be static in the class where it is declared.
        Returns:
        field name of the EventType object

      • eventClass

        public abstract Class<?> eventClass
        If it's an EntityEvent, then the class is EntityEvent.class, so if you define your own event class, it'll be MyEvent.class. This member can be omitted if the marked method parameter type matches the event class.
        Returns:
        event class
        Default:
        javafx.event.Event.class
